page.title: 02YSGOL BRYN COLLEN LLANGOLLEN
page.content: The{school}was opened in 1981.The {junior}department has five classes,the {infant}department has four classes including the nursery.There are{five teachers in the juniors and{four}in the infants and altogether there are approximately{225 pupils.}The school hall is used for P.E., assemblies and dinners.At dinner time you can have sandwiches,go home or use the {cafeteria}in the hall.Music lessons are taken in the activities room when {5 peripatetic teachers}visit the school.The school{uniform}is grey trousers or skirt,grey jumper or cardigan,red tie,blue,grey or white shirt.Our{subjects}are maths, english, welsh,topic,R.E.,P.E. and games.We have three breaks one at ten thirty,one at two fifteen both are fifteen minutes long.The lunch break lasts an hour.
